tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Opening Ceremony - London 2012 Paralympic Games
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: The International Paralympic Committee (IPC) is the global governing body of the Paralympic Movement. The IPC organizes the Summer and Winter Paralympic Games, and serves as the International Federation for nine sports, for which it supervises and co-ordinates the World Championships and other competitions. The IPC is committed to enabling Paralympic athletes to achieve sporting excellence and to develop sport opportunities for all persons with a disability from the beginner to elite level. In addition, the IPC aims to promote the Paralympic values, which include courage, determination, inspiration and equality. For further information, please visit www.paralympic.org. To watch live action and videos on demand of the London 2012 Paralympic Games, and subscribe to ParalympicSport.TV, please go to www.youtube.com Also, you may follow the Paralympic Movement on Facebook at www.facebook.com or on Twitter at www.twitter.com

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: The Enlightenment specifically set itself against faith and revelation (saying﻿ that human reason is the ultimate source of truth). Celebrating this is a con of a truly epic scale. And the arrogance is self-contained within the idea of us having no limit and being the ultimate authority. As for which religion to mention...that would be the one which made this country, which is at the core of all our laws and which the head of state is sworn to uphold.
whats the﻿ name of the song when the nations﻿ parade started ?

Sigh, sorry I'm not remotely interested in the paralympics.I am interested in why my government and media outlets here seem to﻿ be trying to make such an attitude as mine taboo.Are people who are indifferent to this suppose to lie just for the sake of PC and pretend to be thrilled?,Such a person is a hypocrite.I suspect there are many of them.

Besides the paralympics started in 1948 which is way before the era of 'PC' as an ideology. It emerged from sympathy for people, nothing more complex than that - people injured in WW2 actually.
Not everyone is 'touchy-feely' we know that, and that's ok. But i definitely wouldn't start linking this to 'governments and media' as though some kind of manipulation is going on. All the people turning up and cheering are﻿ sincere, let them enjoy their moment, it doesn't affect you at all!!
no﻿ audio here
I live in Thailand and I am very disappointed that I am unable to watch any of the live streaming. 'Not available in your country' is all I see! Love﻿ and peace
There's your problem. Trusting newspapers﻿ to deliver news.
Mas maganda pa ito kesa﻿ dun sa isa..
Chemical Brothers - Galvanize﻿

Birdy kicks lots of ass at 3:11:38
Way﻿ to go Birdy!
Well im just saying what ive read in the newspapers ;l ﻿
PEOLE STOP TALKING ABOUT THE COMMENTATORS AND THAT, you have found the ceremony to watch. SO PUT﻿ COMMENTS ABOUT THIS CEREMONY AND SAY WHAT YOU LIKED ABOUT IT NAD WHAT YOU DIDT.
Galvanize, by The Chemical Brothers.﻿
I came﻿ here for Birdy
But this one, it was in an﻿ astounding league of its own :D

'sorry I'm not remotely interested in the paralympics'
You don't need to apologise, you're entitled to not be interested in paralympics, olympics, sports, or anything else﻿ you choose. But surely there is no harm in supporting people that worked hard to overcome difficulties most of us don't face. If they can pick themselves up, then so can the rest, & that's why 11 million people tuned in. It's not just for the sake of PC. No one is asking you to become charitable ambassador or anything!
Has anyone mentioned the commentators﻿ yet?
USA﻿ USA USA!
I hear Wonderman!﻿ 1:06:58
WOWW!!! VIVA MEXICO!!!! what is﻿ the name´s song at 1:40:29?
Yeah, me too, from the﻿ Netherlands.
Go﻿ brazil!!!

The religion that made my country was not made by Henry or Luther, and never sought to destroy the Catholic church that came before it but rather to reform it from errors that had (inevitably) crept in (such as indulgences). And the church is Christ's body on earth (many today forget that); so God, religion and church are inseperable. Are other faiths invalid? Yes. Is that arrogance? No more than commanding that all faiths﻿ are valid.The arrogance is when humans worship humans here though....

The religion that made your country was﻿ borne from a king not wishing to adhere to papal dictates and decided to make himself head of the Church as well as State. It was later that they took on the principles from Luthers vision and the Church started to become what it is today. Before that, the laws were what they said. Are you talking about God, Religion or Church cos they're not the same thing? And by your comments you imply all other faiths are invalid...That's the only arrogance I see here.
who would﻿ dislike this?
